title: Advanced Language Proficiency Course Through Object-Oriented Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and collaborative project experience
context.additional_context: A language learning environment emphasizing job applicability for current professionals, performing knowledge object-based activities that replicate real workplace contexts via simulations/VR.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze shared language knowledge objects (documents/scenarios) in VR simulations, collaborate with team members, and derive three or more practical problem-solving strategies.
Learners can visualize language expression patterns using an object-oriented collaborative learning model and complete team-based project deliverables based on this analysis.
Learners can document the evolution of knowledge objects using digital collaboration tools and explain five or more improved object cases in final project presentations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
